channel.title: New version of Include Content Item plugin that supports the latest Joomla 3.3
channel.description: Discuss New version of Include Content Item plugin that supports the latest Joomla 3.3

item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi Claudia, Can you try to do one more test? 1) Create another simple article with only one line: "this is a test" 2) Create a second article that includes Article #1 above 3) Now display Article #2 Please let me know what you see on the screen. Do you see one line of "this is a test", or 2 lines? Warm Regards, /kksou
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: Claudia says:
item.description: Hi kksou, why am I getting the intro text repetition?http://www.hybris.com.br/beta/index.php /portfolio/editorial I tried to figured out but I don't know where I have to change the code. Thank you,
item.dc:creator: Claudia
